replies.author: 梓
replies.txt_content: 配置文件  关键词Update或类似关键词的配置

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content:
麻烦发一下这个插件的设置文件的全部内容

看一下插件的设置文件
找到类似于检查更新的英文字样，把true改成false

replies.author: DaNp
replies.txt_content:
plugins\ChestCommands\config.yml

改为false即可
update-notifications: true
